entries.title: Batch 3 Remaining Defects Fixed
entries.description: Fixed D3 (YouTube niche filter): dropdown now uses emoji prefixes (üéÆ, üé®, üêæ) that match data. Fixed D1-PARTIAL (header loading): shows 'just now ¬∑ Ready' instead of 'unknown ¬∑ Idle'. All 13 defects now fixed.

entries.title: YouTube Cron Updated with Browser Protocol
entries.description: Added AGENTS.md browser protocol to YouTube Research cron. Proper sequence: shell command ‚Üí profile='chrome' ‚Üí get tab ID ‚Üí interact. NOT profile='openclaw' (requires extension icon click).
